ids.description: Limit lookup to items with specific ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

excludedIds.description: Exclude from the lookup items with specific ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

datasetIds.description: Limit lookup to items containing the specific dataset ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

like.description: Limit lookup to items whose name matches the pattern

ids.description: Limit lookup to items with specific ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

excludedIds.description: Exclude from the lookup items with specific ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

conversationIds.description: Limit lookup to items that have the specific conversation ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

datasetIds.description: Limit lookup to items that have the specific dataset ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

isActive.description: Limit lookup to items that are active, or inactive or both. If set, the list of flags must not be empty

ids.description: Limit lookup to items with specific ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

userIds.description: Limit lookup to items belonging to specific user ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

excludedIds.description: Exclude from the lookup items with specific ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

isActive.description: Limit lookup to items that are active, or inactive or both. If set, the list of flags must not be empty

like.description: Limit lookup to items whose name or email matches the pattern

ConversationMessageKind.description: (0 - CrossDatasetQuery = 0 - CrossDataset Query, 1 - CrossDatasetResponse = 1 - CrossDataset Response, 2 - InDataExploreQuery = 2 - InDataExplore Query, 3 - InDataExploreResponse = 3 - InDataExplore Response)

ids.description: Limit lookup to items with specific ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

excludedIds.description: Exclude from the lookup items with specific ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

conversationIds.description: Limit lookup to items that have the specific conversation ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

kinds.description: Limit lookup to items that have the specific kind. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

conversationId.description: The conversation id to include the user query

autoCreateConversation.description: Option to auto create new conversation if no conversation id provided. Leaving it empty is equivalent to false. Should not be true if Conversation id is provided

autoUpdateDatasets.description: Option to auto update the conversation datasets with the query context. Leaving it empty is equivalent to false. Should not be true if Conversation id is not provided of autocreate is set to true

query.description: The user query for which datasets must be discovered

resultCount.description: The number of results to retrieve for the query

datasetIds.description: Limit lookup to datasets from the specific ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

collectionIds.description: Limit lookup to datasets from the specific collections Ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

userCollectionIds.description: Limit lookup to datasets from the specific user collections Ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

ids.description: Limit lookup to items with specific ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

excludedIds.description: Exclude from the lookup items with specific ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

collectionIds.description: Limit lookup to items belonging to the specific collection ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

like.description: Limit lookup to items whose name matches the pattern

license.description: Limit lookup to items whose license matches the provided value

mimeType.description: Limit lookup to items whose mime type matches the provided value

fieldsOfScience.description: Limit lookup to items belonging to the specific fields of science. If set, the list of values must not be empty

EntryStatus.description: (0 - Success = 0 - Successful evaluation, 1 - Error = 1 - Problem in evaluation)

FieldSet.title: Projection Fields

fields.title: Projection list
fields.description: The list of properties to include in the response for each returned record. Property names can be qualified with . to control nested objects

FieldSet.description: The list of field to include in the response model. Fields can be qualified with . to control nested properties

Header.title: Additional directives

countAll.title: Counting outside paging
countAll.description: Control if the count returned will be evaluated omitting the requested paging. If true, the full number of records mathing the predicates will be returned. If false, the count will be over the retrieved records

Header.description: Additional directives for the lookup operaiton

query.description: A string containing the user query in natural language. Cannot be empty.

datasetIds.description: The datasets to look into. Cannot be empty.

IsActive.description: (0 - Inactive = 0 - Inactive entry, 1 - Active = 1 - Active entry)

Ordering.title: Ordering directives

items.title: Ordering clause
items.description: The ordering to be applied for the returned records. Multiple fields can be set. Prepending + applies ascending ordering while - descending

Ordering.description: Ordering directives to be applied for the returned models. If paging is set, ordering must be set also

Paging.title: Paging directives

offset.title: Record offset
offset.description: Offset to start retrieving records from. Starts from 0

Paging.description: Paging directives to be applied for the returned models. If paging is set, ordering must be set also

PrincipalKind.description: (0 - User = 0 - Grant assigned at the user level, 1 - Group = 1 - Grant assigned at the user group level)
x-enum-descriptions: 0 - Grant assigned at the user level
1 - Grant assigned at the user group level

ResponseStatus.description: (0 - Success = 0 - Successful evaluation, 1 - Error = 1 - Problem in evaluation)

TargetKind.description: (0 - Dataset = 0 - Grant assigned at the dataset level, 1 - Collection = 1 - Grant assigned at the collection level)
x-enum-descriptions: 0 - Grant assigned at the dataset level
1 - Grant assigned at the collection level

UserCollectionKind.description: (0 - User = 0 - User entry, 1 - Favorites = 1 - Favorites entry)

ids.description: Limit lookup to items with specific ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

userIds.description: Limit lookup to items belonging to specific user ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

excludedIds.description: Exclude from the lookup items with specific ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

isActive.description: Limit lookup to items that are active, or inactive or both. If set, the list of flags must not be empty

kind.description: Limit lookup to items based on the collection kind. If set, the list of flags must not be empty

like.description: Limit lookup to items whose name or email matches the pattern

excludedIds.description: Exclude from the lookup items with specific ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

datasetIds.description: Limit lookup to items that have the specific dataset ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

excludedIds.description: Exclude from the lookup items with specific ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

like.description: Limit lookup to items whose name matches the pattern

ids.description: Limit lookup to items with specific ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

excludedIds.description: Exclude from the lookup items with specific ids. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

idpSubjectIds.description: Limit lookup to items with specific subject identifiers as produced from the idp. If set, the list of ids must not be empty

like.description: Limit lookup to items whose name or email matches the pattern

kinds.description: Limit lookup to items with specific kinds. If set, the list of values must not be empty

like.description: Limit lookup to items whose name matches the pattern

excludeStaled.description: Limit lookup to items that are or are not staled

includePaused.description: Limit lookup to items that are or are not paused

runState.description: Limit lookup to items who are at a specific state. If set, the list of values must not be empty

workflowIds.description: Limit lookup to items that are in the Workflow Id List

runType.description: Limit lookup to items that are specifically triggered by that exact run type

state.description: Limit lookup to items who are at a specific state. If set, the list of values must not be empty

WorkflowRunState.description: (0 - Queued = 0 - Queued, 1 - Running = 1 - Running, 2 - Success = 2 - Success, 3 - Failed = 3 - Failed)

WorkflowRunType.description: (0 - Backfill = 0 - Backfill, 1 - Scheduled = 1 - Scheduled, 2 - Manual = 2 - Manual, 3 - Asset_triggered = 3 - Asset_triggered)

WorkflowTaskInstanceState.description: (0 - Removed = 0 - Removed, 1 - Scheduled = 1 - Scheduled, 2 - Queued = 2 - Queued, 3 - Running = 3 - Running, 4 - Success = 4 - Success, 5 - Restarting = 5 - Restarting, 6 - Failed = 6 - Failed, 7 - Up_for_retry = 7 - Up_for_retry, 8 - Up_for_reschedule = 8 - Up_for_reschedule, 9 - Upstream_failed = 9 - Upstream_failed, 10 - Skipped = 10 - Skipped, 11 - Deferred = 11 - Deferred)
